DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Pancreatic Midgut Neuroendocrine Tumours Having Progressed Radiologically While Previously Treated With Lanreotide Autogel® 120 mg
DOC.criteria: Histopathologically confirm , grade 1 2 , metastatic locally advanced , unresectable pNET ( pNET cohort ) midgut NET ( midgut cohort ) without hormone relate syndrome , proliferation index ( Ki67 ) ≤20 % .
